data.title: Test Post with Markdown
data.content:
# Heading 1

## Heading 2

This post has **bold text** and *italic text*.

### Code Block

```javascript
const test = 'code block';
console.log(test);
```

Inline `code` is also supported.

> This is a blockquote
> with multiple lines

- List item 1
- List item 2
- List item 3

1. Numbered item 1
2. Numbered item 2

External link: [Example Link](https://example.com)

Internal link: [Internal](/posts/other-post)

Multiple paragraphs are separated.

Like this.
